title: Edelman Retires, Offseason Workouts, and Marc Ross on the NFL Draft
description:
Kevin and Nora react to Julian Edelman’s announced retirement (01:00), as well as teams not participating in offseason workouts (06:00). Later they are joined by NFL Network analyst Marc Ross to discuss biases against Black quarterbacks, what to look for when scouting for elite receiver prospects, and much more (11:00).
Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Guest: Marc Ross
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
